title: robinfromdahood
author: robinfromdahood
content: hi yall,been long time around collectin some less worth collectibles and i think its worth a try to look for cas/bitbill graded coin/card.edit/loadedAm located in Germany.Willing to pay fair price for the pieces.would be paying in btc,obviously going first to DT members or would require escrow at forum if not.Lmk wacha have

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: There are some graded Bitbills up for auction here including a 5 btc one:https://www.greatcollections.com/Coin/1367706/2011-5-BTC-Bitbills-Beta-Card-PCGS-Genuine

comments.author: robinfromdahood
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on June 06, 2023, 12:54:20 PMThere are some graded Bitbills up for auction here including a 5 btc one:https://www.greatcollections.com/Coin/1367706/2011-5-BTC-Bitbills-Beta-Card-PCGS-GenuineThanks MJ! For now,looks like a steal but 19days left..ill give it a shoot

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: Some were just on Scarce.city not long ago. There is a option on the site to message the seller. The Bitbills didn't get any bids and did not sell. They also had a few loaded Cas coins as well. Might be worth a shot.

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: I know a respected collector that has a 5 Cas they may sell. I sent them a message to reach out to you if they are interested in letting it go.

comments.author: robinfromdahood
comments.body: Quote from: Spokanistan51 on June 06, 2023, 05:53:13 PMI know a respected collector that has a 5 Cas they may sell. I sent them a message to reach out to you if they are interested in letting it go. Thank y'all for replies.finally,i have been in touch w Coblee and we might work something out at his entire bitbill set.Will update

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: robinfromdahood on June 07, 2023, 09:46:58 AMQuote from: Spokanistan51 on June 06, 2023, 05:53:13 PMI know a respected collector that has a 5 Cas they may sell. I sent them a message to reach out to you if they are interested in letting it go. Thank y'all for replies.finally,i have been in touch w Coblee and we might work something out at his entire bitbill set.Will update  Damn....now that is a nice set to own for sure...will they be able to stop the ongoing auction at https://www.greatcollections.com/search.php?q=bitbills&mode=product&sort=01   Not only are the fully graded but also have provenance thru Coblee. I can only dream of affording to own that set.   Good luck on your hunt for these and this set...cheers
